description: Try this comforting pumpkin soup with bacon.
name: Pumpkin & Bacon Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 L chicken stock or vegetable stock

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from heat. Allow to cook slightly. Blend soup to desired consistency. If too thick add a little extra stock. Serve in a bowl with a drizzle of cream on top.
